lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Peruvian central bank president Leonel Figueroa and the head of Bank of Mexico, Miguel Mancera Aguayo, met in Mexico City yesterday to coordinate actions aimed at consolidating the upward trend in the price of silver, the official newspaper El Peruano said today.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: He spoke to reporters at the presidential palace after meeting president Alan Garcia, whom he said recently spoke by telephone with Mexican president Miguel de la Madrid.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Last Tuesday, the government instructed Minpeco, which handles all Peru's exports of refined silver and state- produced ore, to immediately freeze all new silver sales until the metal's price reached equilibrium in the world market.
